full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 218 of 262 1929 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 A. Okay. 2 Q. And you see the flight there on August 13th, which is flight 16, I believe; right? 3 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. That is -- sorry. We'll go back to the flight before that. 6 That's the flight 15 from Teterboro to Columbus; right? 7 A. Okay, Teterboro to Columbus, yes. 8 Q. And the passengers on that flight are Jeffrey and one PAX; right? 9 10 A. Correct. 11 Q. So that's an unknown passenger? 12 A. Correct. 13 Q. And Columbus, Ohio is where Les Wexner lives? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. And he's the billionaire owner of The Limited; right? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. It's a clothing company? 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. Was he one of Jeffrey Epstein's clients? 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. And Epstein had a home in Columbus, Ohio, near Mr. Wexner, didn't he? 22 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. So, generally, trips to Columbus, Ohio is for when 25 Mr. Epstein is visiting Mr. Wexner or to visit? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019080
